detail_desc: Top in linen jersey with a V-neck and short sleeves.
Chiffon dress with lace at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist with a partially pleated, flared skirt. Lined.
Imitation leather mules with adjustable straps with metal buckles. Moulded insoles and fluted soles.
Vest top in a loose knit with a deep V-neck, low cut back and fringes at the hem. Unlined.
Fitted dress in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back and long raglan sleeves.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

V-neck playsuit in soft washed denim made from Tencel™ lyocell. Sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front, short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, side pockets and a seam at the waist with covered elastication and a tie belt.
Longer, oversized jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a button at the front and welt front pockets with a flap. Lined.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and full feet with elasticated heels.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Straight-style shirt in linen with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a cotton blend with elastication at the top.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in airy, patterned chiffon made partly from recycled polyester. Inset panels front and back to create volume and long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, Jersey lining. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
V-neck T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front, an imitation suede peak and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Scarf woven in a soft cashmere blend containing some wool with fringes on the short sides. Size 35x175 cm.
Wide jumper in a soft rib knit with wide ribbing around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves. Slightly longer at the back.
Long skirt in lace made partly from recycled polyester with several flounced tiers. High waist with wide elastication. Partly lined in jersey.
Long-sleeved cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with raw edges. Jersey-lined hood and patch front pockets. No fasteners.
Elastic scrunchies in soft velour.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Trousers in a patterned viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Wide jersey top in a soft viscose blend with embroidery, short sleeves and an opening with a button at the back.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Short, high-waisted A-line skirt in soft twill with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a pleated front with buttons at one side and a smooth back. Unlined.
Shorts in a textured linen blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, tie belt, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Metal hair decoration with sparkly stones and leaf-shaped pendants.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a decorative back pocket. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Fully lined bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a plastic fastener at the back. Matching bikini bottoms.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, diagonal side pockets and a fake welt back pocket with a button.
Long-sleeved blouse in a crêpe weave with a collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Treggings in superstretch twill with a high, elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a ribbed neckline and tie detail at the front of the hem.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Small, zipped chest pocket, flap front pockets with a button, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, a single back vent, and a drawstring at the hem. Partly lined in pile.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and cutaway coverage at the back.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Jacquard-weave top in an airy Tencel™ lyocell and silk blend. V-neck with gathered seams at the front and narrow ties at the back of the neck, and a concealed zip in the side. Dropped shoulders and long puff sleeves with pleats and elasticated cuffs.
Wide jersey top in a soft cotton and modal blend with embroidery and long, wide sleeves.
Swimming trunks with an elasticated drawstring wait. Lined at the front.

Long dress in a patterned jacquard weave in a narrow cut at the top with flounces and an adjustable hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck. Open section at the back, decorative flounces down the entire back, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless dress in airy, patterned chiffon with spaghetti shoulder straps and a contrasting colour trim at the top. Three tiers of wide flounces with overlocked edges that create movement in the dress. Lined.
Shorts in woven fabric with a high, elasticated paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Side pockets, fly with a concealed zip, and short, wide legs.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short blouse in a crêpe weave with a lace yoke at the front. Narrow, rounded collar with a sewn-on satin tie and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Brazilian briefs in cotton with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket at the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Top in woven fabric with wrapover straps at the front that tie at the back of the neck, an open back and a concealed zip in one side. Seam under the bust and a flared lower section that is slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Dance shoes with an elastic strap over the foot, motif on the front and appliqués. Cotton linings and insoles and soft suede soles.

Body in lace and mesh with underwired, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a lined gusset with press-studs.
High profile boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, boot lacing and a tab with a metal fastener at the front, and a loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and insoles. Heel 2.4 cm.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft pattern knit with hole-knit sections, long, wide sleeves and a flounce at the cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.
Fully lined bikini top with short sleeves and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Decorative tie detail at the front and narrow elastication at the hem.
Metal earrings in various sizes and designs. Some of the earrings are decorated with rhinestones and some with pearly plastic beads.
Lightweight puffer jacket in nylon with a filling of 70% down and 30% feathers. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs.
Cycling shorts in soft viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist and mesh sections at the sides.
Short, fitted jumper in a soft, fine knit with a ribbed turtle neck, long sleeves and a motif on the front.
Glittery hair clips in metal and plastic. Length 7 cm.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small stand-up collar and V-neck opening with ties at the front. Pleats at the top and a straight-cut hem.
Ankle boots with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the back, faux fur linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) soles.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Suede ankle boots with pointed toes, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5 cm.

Oversized shirt in soft, narrow-wale cotton corduroy with a collar, covered buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pockets and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey, one in pointelle and one with an all-over print. Small bow at the top and a picot-trimmed flounce that continues over the shoulders. Press-studs at the back of the neck and crotch.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a press-stud on the shoulders and a gathered seam at the top. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric. High waist with covered elastication at the back, a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners. Pleats at the front, shaping darts at the back, diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and legs with creases.
One-shoulder, fitted top in soft, patterned jersey with elastication at the top and one long sleeve.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.
Brazilian briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder jersey top with a smocked panel at the top and bottom and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

Soft nursing top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and functional fastening for easier nursing access. Integral soft top with an elasticated hem. Can be used both during pregnancy and when nursing afterwards.
